CustomField.description: Counts up the number of premium order management opportunities and Premium: Marketplace Opportunities that have the relevant statuses - for use with OPSSYS-1030 validation rule name: signed onboarding opportunity check - OPSSYS-1030
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Counts up the number of Premium: order management opportunities with status after signed/onboarding OR Counts up the number of Premium: Marketplace opportunities with status closed succeeded
CustomField.label: # of Premium Opportunities

summaryFilterItems.value: Signed/Onboarding, Closed Won, Execution, Closed Won, Closed:Succeeded
